Package controller

Class UpdateAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
controller.UpdateAppointmentController
public class UpdateAppointmentController extends javafx.application.Application
This controller allows users to update appointments.

      Main method.

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Start method.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SQLException
      The screen disables all ID fields at initialization. It also sets up business hours and collects time zone.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onSave

      public void onSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      Once the user is ready, the onSave method will check for errors and datatype incompatibilities. After everything is validated, the new appointment is added.
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • checkAppointmentOverlap

      public boolean checkAppointmentOverlap() throws SQLException
      This method checks if there are any appointments that overlap with already existing appointments. If it does, the program will throw and error.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateAppointment

      public void updateAppointment() throws SQLException
      This method collects data from the text fields and updates the appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onCancel

      public void onCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      This cancels the current progress and sends the user back to the main screen.
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • sendAppointment

      public void sendAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      This recieves data from the main screen controller. Used for filling text filled on initialization.
